priv.name: Registered Member
priv.description: Registered members can participate in DAC governance via voting for custodians and enjoy all eosDAC Member benefits

priv.name: Custodian
priv.description: Custodians are community elected guardians of the DAC

pub.name: Block Production
pub.description: Block Production role holders discuss block production activities and look after eosDAC block production on EOS and EOS sidechains

pub.name: B2B
pub.description: Everything Business related, for example, exchange communication, partnerships, collaboration are handled by members wearing B2B role

pub.name: Content Creation
pub.description: Can create Content? Get this role and start contributing

pub.name: Community Engagement
pub.description: Community Engagement role holders are the watchers, influencers of community who work together to keep the community engaged

pub.name: Development
pub.description: Development role is for the members who like to build and break the code by contributing to the development of eosDAC tools

pub.name: Legal
pub.description: Members that want to participate in the Legal aspects of the DAC, for instance Governance, Constitution etc

pub.name: Operations
pub.description: DAC members that are committed to build and suggest efficient systems and tools to help the DAC accomplish great things.

pub.name: Translations
pub.description: Members with the Translations role help in translating post, websites content, some times things can also get very technical
